attributes.action: Terminate MTR Crossrails's £1.4bn contract to operate Crossrail Elizabeth Line.
attributes.additional_details:
30/1/19 Alleged cover up over safety concerns.
https://www.scmp.com/news/hong-kong/transport/article/2184383/sha-tin-central-link-faces-further-delay-after-missing
21/7/19 Masked men storm a train station
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-china-49066982
11/8/19 Police fire teargas inside station
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-china-49312752
31/8/19 Hong Kong police violently tackled suspected protesters inside train.
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-china-49540751
attributes.background: MTR is majority owned(75%)by the HK SAR gov, are strongly influenced by the Communist Party in China. Recent events in Hong Kong have shown they respond to political pressures from Beijing, their actions and inactions have caused disruptions and demonstrated disregard for public safety.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for Transport for London (TfL) and not the UK Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

You can find out more about how to petition TfL and the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
